Question.Subject: Upgrading to Firefox 3.6 from 3.5.8 and keeping the Settings & Bookmarks. Do I need to uninstall first ?
Question.Content:
hi.
I wanted to keep my bookmarks & settings etc. Are they gonna be automatically stored ? I think they are gonna be stored in firefox setting folder... right ? then be used/updated by the new firefox ..?
And Do I need to uninstall my firefox 3.5.8 first before installing the update ??? or is it automatic
I ran Vista 64
thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
The new version will automatically get the configurations and setting from the older one, so no worries go ahead.
Regards

Answer.Content: Just do the upgrade, everything will be kept intact.

The new version will automatically get the configurations and setting from the older one, so no worries go ahead.
Regards
